CustomField.description: It is the combination of SourceSystem and ExternalID with the format as SourceSystem-ExternalID. The purpose is only to support the API integration pattern with the unique ExternalID for SFDC limitation and performance.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: It is the combination of SourceSystem and ExternalID with the format as SourceSystem-ExternalID. The purpose is only to support the API integration pattern with the unique ExternalID for SFDC limitation and performance.
CustomField.label: Integration Key
